thread.title: APNewsBreak: Penn St. seeks improvement options for stadium
thread.title_full: APNewsBreak: Penn St. seeks improvement options for stadium

title: APNewsBreak: Penn St. seeks improvement options for stadium
text: > Top News APNewsBreak: Penn St. seeks improvement options for stadium FILE - In this Saturday, Sept. 26, 2015, file photo, San Diego State kicks off to Penn State during the first half of an NCAA college football game at Beaver Stadium in State College, Pa. Penn State officials are seeking options to renovate or replace Beaver Stadium in the next 10 years. The university has hired an architecture firm to recommend improvements and funding plans for its 18 athletic facilities, including the worldâ€™s third-largest stadium. (AP Photo/Gene J. Puskar, File)
